{index + 1}

{post.title}

))}

{index + 1}

))}

))}

Ïò§Îäò Í≤åÏãúÍ∏Ä {posts.filter(post => { const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; return post.createdAt === today; }).length}

); }; export default Sidebar;
